n = 2400                 # number of time steps  
tau = tfinal / n         # time step
t = tau * arange(n+1)    # time values
U = zeros([m, n+1])

import scipy.sparse as sp
from scipy.sparse.linalg import spsolve
B = sp.csr_matrix(sp.eye(m) - tau * Dxx)
